Key Match Events: Scotty Pippen Jr. recorded a first-career triple-double with 11 points, 11 assists, and 10 rebounds
Zach Edey had 14 points, eight rebounds, and two blocks
Kyshawn George scored 17 points for the Wizards
Jonas Valanciunas added 16 points for the Wizards
Corey Kispert finished with 14 points for the Wizards
With 3:50 left in the third quarter, there was a scuffle between Zach Edey and Jonas Valanciunas resulting in double-technicals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies maintained a lead of at least 20 points through the bulk of the second half
The Wizards are dealing with injuries to key players, which left them with a couple of rookies in the starting lineup
The Grizzlies are continually picking up the pace this season, putting them in the top 5 in the league
